text: Triple Layer Flared Jeans Light Blue Polka Dot Crepe de Chine Shirt White Womens Polka Dot Leather Loafers White Triple Layer Denim Midi Skirt Light Blue Striped Logo Baby T-Shirt Red Heart Hoop Earrings Red TRIPLE LAYER JEANS DISCOVER OUR DENIM COLLECTION, WHERE CLASSIC DENIM IS TRANSFORMED THROUGH BOLD LAYERS, STATEMENT DETAILS AND A FEARLESS SPIRIT. SHOP THE RUNWAY Polka Dot Peplum Crop Top White Heartline Contrast Leggings Black Lips Bag Black Sequin Heart Mini Bag Red Leather Kitten Heels Black LIPS BAGS Within the Fiorucci universe, symbols become design signatures, instantly recognizable, emotionally resonant, and deeply evocative. The Lips Bag stands as the clearest expression of this creative language: a graphic emblem transformed into an object of individuality. Defined by its unmistakable lips silhouette, the design is pushed forward by subtle details, all reminiscent of familiar beauty codes: a discreet pocket nestled between the lips and lipstick-inspired features, from the zip fastener to the color palette. The Lips Bag balances a clean, sculptural aesthetic with a strong visual identity. Compact yet highly functional, it is available in a playful range of sizes, from mini to giga, and across a variety of materials including faux leather, patent, and glitter. It eventually turns into a collectible piece: every size, every color, every finish becomes part of a personal Fiorucci wardrobe.
